text: The University of Rennes was a French university located in the city of Rennes. It was established by the union of the 3 faculties of the city (Law, letters, and science) in 1885. In 1969, it was divided in two new universities: * the University of Rennes 1 * the University of Rennes 2 – Upper Brittany == See also == * List of early modern universities in Europe Category:Defunct universities and colleges in France Category:Education in Rennes
title: University of Rennes
